ram[20] = 8'b10000000;
ram[21] = 8'b01100100;
ram[22] = 8'b01100100;
ram[23] = 8'b10001100;
ram[24] = 8'b10010110;
ram[25] = 8'b01010000;
ram[26] = 8'b00111100;
ram[27] = 8'b00110010;
ram[28] = 8'b00001010;
ram[29] = 8'b01010000;
ram[30] = 8'b00110010;
ram[31] = 8'b01100010;
ram[32] = 8'b10010110;
ram[33] = 8'b10110100;
ram[34] = 8'b11001000;
ram[35] = 8'b01111101;
